statements: SELECT * FROM retirement_account;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM retirement_account WHERE threshold > 1000;
SELECT account_id, user_id, balance FROM retirement_account ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM retirement_account;
SELECT AVG(balance) AS avg_balance FROM retirement_account WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM retirement_account;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM retirement_account WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT account_id, user_id, balance FROM retirement_account WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, user_id, balance FROM retirement_account WHERE threshold > 0.05 ORDER BY threshold ASC, balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, user_id, balance FROM retirement_account WHERE user_id IN (100, 200, 300) ORDER BY user_id ASC, balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance, alert_threshold FROM UserRetirementAccount;
SELECT user_id, alert_timestamp, alert_message FROM AlertLog;
SELECT account_balance, user_id, alert_threshold FROM UserRetirementAccount;
SELECT alert_message, user_id, alert_timestamp FROM AlertLog;
SELECT user_id, alert_threshold, account_balance FROM UserRetirementAccount;
SELECT user_id, account_balance, alert_threshold FROM UserRetirementAccount WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT account_balance, alert_threshold, user_id FROM UserRetirementAccount WHERE account_balance > 50000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT user_id, alert_timestamp, alert_message FROM AlertLog ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, alert_message FROM AlertLog WHERE user_id = 200 AND alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM UserRetirementAccount JOIN AlertLog ON UserRetirementAccount.user_id = AlertLog.user_id WHERE user_id = 300 ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT notification_id, account_id, threshold_id FROM notifications LIMIT 5;
SELECT threshold_amount, notification_type FROM thresholds WHERE notification_type = 'email';
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT account_id, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 5000
SELECT * FROM notifications JOIN thresholds ON notifications.threshold_id = thresholds.threshold_id WHERE threshold_amount > 10000 ORDER BY notification_date ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM retirement_accounts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_balance DESC
SELECT account_id, notification_type FROM thresholds JOIN notifications ON thresholds.threshold_id = notifications.threshold_id
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT account_id, user_id, balance, threshold FROM RetirementAccount;
SELECT user_id, message, timestamp FROM Notification ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ThresholdSetting WHERE threshold > 100;

SELECT user.username, RetirementAccount.balance FROM User JOIN RetirementAccount ON User.user_id = RetirementAccount.user_id WHERE RetirementAccount.balance > 5000 ORDER BY RetirementAccount.balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Notification WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT User.username, User.email, ThresholdSetting.threshold FROM User LEFT JOIN ThresholdSetting ON User.user_id = ThresholdSetting.user_id WHERE ThresholdSetting.threshold IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM User WHERE username LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT Notification.message, User.username FROM Notification JOIN User ON Notification.user_id = User.user_id ORDER BY Notification.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE retire_account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM thresholds ORDER BY threshold_amount DESC;
SELECT users.username, thresholds.notification_message FROM users INNER JOIN thresholds ON users.user_id = thresholds.threshold_id;
SELECT notifications.* FROM notifications INNER JOIN users ON notifications.user_id = users.user_id WHERE notifications.is_read = false ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, retire_account_balance FROM users ORDER BY retire_account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM thresholds WHERE threshold_amount > 1000;

SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications.notification_content, notifications.notification_date, users.username FROM notifications JOIN users ON notifications.user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY notifications.notification_date DESC;
